meanings.sent1: The small business had a palmy year, making more money than ever before.
meanings.sent2: The garden was palmy with colorful flowers blooming everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The palmy bakery sold so many delicious treats that they ran out of ingredients!
meanings.sent4: Her palmy career in finance allowed her to travel the world and live luxuriously.
meanings.sent5: The palmy fields stretched as far as the eye could see, promising a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a palm tree
meanings.sent1: The resort had palmy decorations, with palm tree motifs adorning every room.
meanings.sent2: The tropical island had a palmy vibe, with palm trees swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: She wore a palmy dress with palm tree prints, feeling like she was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The palmy landscape painted a picture of paradise, with palm trees lining the sandy beaches.
meanings.sent5: The palmy scent of coconut sunscreen filled the air, transporting her to a palm tree paradise.

meanings.sent1: The palmy weather on the day of the event ensured a successful turnout.
meanings.sent2: His palmy smile before the exam hinted at good results to come.
meanings.sent3: The palmy meeting concluded with everyone feeling optimistic about the project.
meanings.sent4: The palmy start to the day set a positive tone for the rest of the week.
meanings.sent5: The palmy opportunity to showcase her talent led to a breakthrough in her career.
